AI Description: Quantum ESPRESSO is an integrated suite of Open-Source computer codes for electronic-structure calculations and materials modeling at the nanoscale. It is based on density-functional theory, plane waves, and pseudopotentials.
Core Features: Some core features of Quantum ESPRESSO include quantum-mechanical molecular dynamics, structural optimization, vibrational properties, and spectroscopic properties calculations. It also allows for parallel computing and supports a variety of exchange-correlation functionals.
General Tags: Quantum Chemistry, Materials Science, Computational Physics
